entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
